title: Decorator_Application-FUN\Componment_Interface.st
text:
//Interface to be implemented by the Decorator class and the ConcreteComponent (Plain Component) class
INTERFACE Component_Interface

title: Decorator_Application-FUN\Componment_Interface_getDescription.st
text:

METHOD getDescription : String
VAR_INPUT
END_VAR

title: Decorator_Application-FUN\Componment_Interface_getValue.st
text:

METHOD getValue : REAL
VAR_INPUT
END_VAR
